title: Master of Wolves
description: Jim London is outraged over the death of his friend, a fellow bounty hunter and werewolf—and thinks the police department of nearby Clarkston cooked up a phony story about Tony’s murder. The only way to find out is to go undercover. And, in his wolf form, Jim can do that better than anybody...There’s one complication, though. The new police-dog handler, Faith Weston, is sexy enough to bring out the animal in any man…
author: Angela Knight
